meanings.definition: The action or process of developing something again.
meanings.sent1: The city's redevelopments brought new life to the old neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The redevelopments in the park included adding new playground equipment.
meanings.sent3: The redevelopments in the town made the buildings look like they had a makeover.
meanings.sent4: Her redevelopments of the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The redevelopments of the school turned it into a modern learning space.

meanings.definition: The result of developing something again.
meanings.sent1: After the redevelopments, the shopping center looked brand new.
meanings.sent2: The redevelopments of the website improved its user interface.
meanings.sent3: The redevelopments of the recipe gave it a fresh taste.
meanings.sent4: The redevelopments of the old house made it more spacious and bright.
meanings.sent5: The redevelopments of the park attracted more visitors with its new features.
